description: '''Sundar Popo''' [[Hummingbird Medal|HBM]], born '''Sundarlal Popo Bahora''' ({{IPA|hi|suⁿd̪ərəlɑːlə poːpoː bəɦoːrɑː|pron}}; 4 November 1943 – 2 May 2000) was a [[Trinidadians and Tobagonians|Trinidadian and Tobagonian]] musician. He is credited as being the father of [[Chutney music]], beginning with his 1969 hit ''Nana and Nani''.
